Connect.query: SELECT ftel.task AS Task, ftel.revision AS Revision, fcel.java_class_error AS JAVA_CLASS_ERROR FROM spider_bmd.full_task_error_list ftel JOIN spider_bmd.full_compiler_error_list fcel ON ftel.java_class_error_id = fcel.id WHERE ftel.task LIKE ? AND ftel.revision = ? AND fcel.java_class_error = ? ORDER BY Task, Revision, JAVA_CLASS_ERROR

Connect.Query: SELECT * FROM test t WHERE t."Name" = ? OR t."Id" = ? AND t."Set" = ?
